00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: 4DOS.C Fri 11-10-2000 4:12:12 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 ***************************************************************************/
00004 
00005 #include <bios.h>
00006 
00007 #ifndef FALSE
00008 #define FALSE 0
00009 #define TRUE !FALSE
00010 #endif
00011 
00012 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00013     FUNCTION: detect_4DOS()
00014      PURPOSE: Detect if 4DOS is present
00015  DESCRIPTION: Use INT 2Fh call
00016      RETURNS: TRUE if 4dos detected, FALSE if not
00017      HISTORY: 911214 V0.1 - Initial version
00018 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00019 int detect_4DOS()
00020 {
00021   union REGS regs;
00022 
00023   regs.x.ax = 0xD44D;
00024   regs.x.bx = 0x0000;
00025   int86(0x2F,&regs,&regs);
00026 
00027   if (regs.x.ax == 0xD44D)
00028   {
00029     /*-------------------
00030       4DOS not present
00031     --------------------*/
00032     return(FALSE);
00033   }
00034 
00035   if (regs.x.ax == 0x44DD)
00036   {
00037     /*-----------------
00038       4DOS is present
00039     ------------------*/
00040     return(TRUE);
00041   }
00042   return(FALSE);
00043 }
00044
